We're happy to share a jhakaas moment with you all. 
#SpiceJet hosted the launch of the movie #Chandramukhi. For the 1st time in the Marathi entertainment world, a film has been promoted using an aircraft. Team #SpiceJet is delighted to be a part of the promotions. Best of Luck! https://t.co/uM5twEi2WQ

data.text: It was an honour for our team to meet Hon’ble @MauritiusPM Shri Pravind Kumar Jugnauth before his departure to Mauritius. He and his delegation expressed their happiness regarding #SpiceJet service on special charter flights, during their travel in India.(1/2) https://t.co/HyFURcNmbB

He mentioned about the possibilities of starting Schedule International flights between India and Mauritius. The conversation concluded with the Hon’ble PM extending best wishes to the entire team of SpiceJet.(2/2)

Juley! Delhi peeps, it’s time to take that Leh trip you have been preparing yourselves for. Now enjoy three non-stop flights from #DelhitoLeh on #SpiceJet. So get a rucksack, a pair of mountain boots & gear up for the Ladakhi life. 
Book now: https://t.co/PykmFjYcix 
#FlySpiceJet https://t.co/3fCYBq7Clc

It was a pleasure flying, Hon. @MauritiusPM – Shri Pravind Jugnauth and his wife, Smt. Kobita Jugnauth, from #VaranasiToDelhi. A memorable experience for our crew members. 
#FlySpiceJet #Mauritius #India #Spicejet https://t.co/uhHywGO2fE
Tanay, you may carry the same in your cabin baggage.
